sentences.en: He fell and sprained his ankle.
sentences.cn: 他摔了一跤，扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.en: He sprained his ankle and had to be helped home.
sentences.cn: 他扭了脚脖子,我们只得把他架回去.

sentences.en: He sprained his ankle when he fell.
He sprained his ankle when playing football.
sentences.cn: 他踢足球时扭伤了脚脖子.

sentences.en: His sprained ankle has puffed up.
sentences.cn: 他那扭伤的脚踝肿起来了.

sentences.en: I sprained my ankle yesterday when I played football.
sentences.cn: 我昨天踢球时扭伤了脚踝.

sentences.en: I stumbled and sprained my ankle.
sentences.cn: 我摔了一跤，把脚脖子扭了。

sentences.en: Mom took a few steps around to show them that she wasn’t hiding a broken leg or a sprained ankle.
sentences.cn: 妈妈在他们面前走了几步，向大家证明，她既没有藏着一条摔伤的腿，也没有扭伤脚踝。

sentences.en: Once I slipped when I was stepping off a curb, and I sprained my ankle.
sentences.cn: 一次我在路边蹦蹦跳跳的时候滑倒了, 扭伤了脚.

sentences.en: Rosa fell and sprained her ankle.
sentences.cn: 罗莎跌倒了,扭伤了足踝.

sentences.en: Scott fell over and sprained his ankle.
sentences.cn: 斯科特摔倒了,扭伤了踝骨.

sentences.en: She sprained her ankle playing squash.
sentences.cn: 她在打软式墙网球时扭伤了脚踝.

sentences.en: The man favored his sprained foot when he walked.
sentences.cn: 那人走路时对他那只扭伤的脚很小心.

sentences.en: The man had fallen into the creek and had sprained his ankle.
sentences.cn: 那人掉进了小溪,把脚踝扭伤了.

sentences.en: When Mary sprained her ankles, John carried her piggyback to the doctors.
sentences.cn: 玛丽扭伤了足踝, 约翰驮她去看医生.

trans.tran_cn: 扭伤（关节）( sprain的过去式和过去分词 )
